bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: Active sync initial scan is not stopped on stopSync
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.2.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug Active sync should stop full initial scan on stopSync To Reproduce
startSync initialScan is ongoing and can take a while to finish on a large tree. this also locks the sub-tree stopSync initialScan on sub-tree is not cancelled and master continues to hold the lock
Expected behavior Cancel ongoing sync Urgency Medium Additional context Current workaround is to restart master
